basics.name: Gautam
basics.label: Research Fellow
basics.summary: Research Fellow at IIT Roorkee, with a passion for integrating technology into science.

work.name: IIT Roorkee
work.position: Research Fellow in Computational Cell Structural Biology Lab
work.summary: Engaged in advanced research on intrinsically disordered proteins, using machine learning and molecular dynamics simulations.
highlights: Implementing Graph Neural Networks for protein structure dynamics
Developing an evaluation pipeline for protein metrics

volunteer.summary: Worked to improve bhawan facilities, focusing on the wellbeing of residents and supporting staff.

education.summary: Specialized in protein structure and dynamics, laying the foundation for advanced research.

awards.title: Qualified GATE XL
awards.summary: Achieved qualification in Life Sciences, opening pathways to research positions.
